item.title: GitLab Checkmarx CI/CD Integration
item.description: Purpose Checkmarx is a good tool to do code analysis, but there are 2 pain points during the flow. Checkmarx can integrate SCM like GitHub/GitLab/..., but it cannot be triggered by by a code commit, it can only schedule the job to run the scan. (If I don't commit code, I don't want to waste resources scanning the code.) Checkmarx has a built-in issue tracking system, but I think most people prefer to use their issue tracking system in their Git or JIRA or .
